name: TheMatrix
short_description:
The Matrix is a software, that allows you to create (and join) a virtual room, choose, what people you want to invite to it and what you want to share with them. You are able to share anything you want, ranging from single files to any service your computer can provide, such as video telephony, chat, network shares or even play LAN computer games with your friends. To your computer, the people in your Matrix  appear as if they were nearby or on the local network.

It is ultimately independent and secure, since no third party server is required for the software to run and all communication is encrypted.
summary: The Matrix is a concept, how people can meet and exchange over the net
